item.title: Chinese startup Z.ai launches powerful open source GLM-4.5 model family with PowerPoint creation
item.description: GLM-4.5’s launch gives enterprise teams a viable, high-performing foundation model they can control, adapt, and scale.

item.title: No more links, no more scrolling—The browser is becoming an AI Agent
item.description: With rumors about a GPT-native browser, search is shifting from finding information to fulfilling tasks. No more links, no more scrolling.

item.title: Anthropic throttles Claude rate limits, devs call foul
item.description: Blaming users that run Claude Code 24/7, Anthropic instituted weekly rate limits for some Claude users resulting in backlash on social media.

item.title: How E2B became essential to 88% of Fortune 100 companies and raised $21 million
item.description: AI infrastructure startup E2B secures $21 million funding with 88% Fortune 100 adoption rate, powering secure AI agent deployments at scale.

item.title: When progress doesn’t feel like home: Why many are hesitant to join the AI migration
item.description: What happens if the AI migration accelerates and sizable portions of the workforce are slow to move out of fear, resistance or inability?
